objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel spanning six meters by six meters with minimal thickness. It has a subtle matte finish suitable for high-traffic exhibition use, providing a neutral gray base that complements the surrounding structures.

A vertical rectangular wall panel measuring six meters wide by three meters tall. It features a vibrant flat paint finish in a single bold color, with a smooth, even surface designed to attract attention to display elements mounted upon it.

A vertical rectangular wall panel measuring six meters deep by three meters tall. It is coated in vibrant flat paint with a smooth texture, serving as a boundary that enhances the booth's immersive feel.
A vertical rectangular wall panel measuring six meters deep by three meters tall. Finished in a vibrant, uniform color with a smooth surface, it frames the booth space and focuses attention inward.

A modern rectangular reception desk measuring two meters wide by one meter deep and 1.2 meters tall. It has sharp, minimalist lines and a high-gloss bright red lacquer finish, conveying a contemporary aesthetic and ensuring high visibility at the entrance.

A tall display shelf unit one meter wide, two meters tall, and half a meter deep. Constructed from sturdy MDF with a smooth white painted finish, featuring three equally spaced shelves for product presentation.

A tall display shelf unit one meter wide, two meters tall, and half a meter deep. Constructed from sturdy MDF with a smooth white painted finish, featuring three equally spaced shelves for product presentation.

A sleek round tabletop with a diameter of 0.8 meters supported by a central cylindrical pedestal base. The surface is finished in a neutral matte tone, and the overall height is 0.75 meters for comfortable seating.

children.specification: A contemporary visitor chair with a molded plastic seat and curved backrest. It has slender metal legs and is designed for stacking, with a seat height of 0.45 meters in neutral gray.

objects.specification: A vertical fabric banner half a meter wide and two meters tall, printed with an abstract colorful pattern. The material is lightweight and slightly translucent, tensioned over a slim internal frame.
